name: BlueHound
body:
### Welcome to BlueHound.
BlueHound is a Bluetooth low-energy device browser for the iPad.  It will display the name and UUID of any low energy bluetooth device in the area that is transmitting.

### On The Horizon
* Add a device details page
* Add more information about each device
tagline: Bluetooth low-energy device browser for the iPad
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
